requirement_tested: User authentication system supporting login and registration for both athletes and sports organizations
user_persona: A new athlete named Jordan who just heard about the sports recruitment platform.
user_goal: Jordan wants to create an account as an athlete and then log in to access the dashboard.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting Registration Page
narrative_steps.description: Jordan visits the homepage and sees the 'Register' tab. He clicks it to begin signing up.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Register' tab.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The registration form with name, email, password, confirm password, and role selection fields is displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Filling Registration Details
narrative_steps.description: Jordan fills out his personal details, selects 'Athlete' as his role, and submits the form.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in registration fields and click Submit.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Account is created successfully, and Jordan is redirected to the dashboard.

narrative_steps.title: Logging In After Registration
narrative_steps.description: Jordan logs out and returns later. He clicks the 'Login' tab and enters his credentials.
narrative_steps.action: Click on 'Login' tab, enter email and password, then click Submit.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Successfully logged in and redirected to the athlete dashboard.

requirement_tested: Athlete profile management including personal information, sports specialties, and experience
user_persona: Jordan, an athlete who has recently joined the platform.
user_goal: Update his profile with sports specialties and upload a profile picture.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Profile Section
narrative_steps.description: After logging in, Jordan goes to his profile section to update personal details.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the profile edit page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Editable form with fields such as first name, last name, sports specialties, and avatar area is shown.

narrative_steps.title: Adding Sports Specialties
narrative_steps.description: Jordan adds multiple sports he specializes in by typing them into the sports specialty field.
narrative_steps.action: Type into sportsSpecialties input field and press enter after each sport.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Sports tags appear dynamically below the input field.

narrative_steps.title: Uploading Avatar
narrative_steps.description: He clicks the avatar area to upload a profile photo.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the avatar area.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: File browser opens allowing him to choose an image file.

narrative_steps.title: Saving Updated Profile
narrative_steps.description: Jordan saves the updated profile information.
narrative_steps.action: Click the Save button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Profile is updated successfully with a confirmation message.

requirement_tested: Job posting functionality for sports organizations to create and manage job listings
user_persona: Coach Taylor, head of a basketball academy looking to hire players.
user_goal: Post a new job listing for a basketball player position at his academy.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Job Posting Interface
narrative_steps.description: Coach Taylor logs in as an organization and navigates to the job posting page.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the job creation form.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Form with fields like title, description, sport type, location, deadline, and requirements appears.

narrative_steps.title: Creating New Job Listing
narrative_steps.description: He fills in all required fields for the job posting and sets the deadline.
narrative_steps.action: Complete all form fields and click Submit.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: New job listing is created and redirected to the job listings page.

narrative_steps.title: Editing Existing Job Post
narrative_steps.description: Later, Coach Taylor realizes there was a typo and edits the job post.
narrative_steps.action: Click Edit button next to the job entry and make changes.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Changes are saved and reflected immediately in the job listing.

requirement_tested: Job browsing interface allowing users to search and filter available positions
user_persona: Jordan, an aspiring athlete searching for opportunities.
user_goal: Find a suitable basketball coaching position near his city.

narrative_steps.title: Browsing Available Jobs
narrative_steps.description: Jordan logs in and goes to the job browsing page where he sees a list of jobs.
narrative_steps.action: Visit the jobs browse page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Grid of job cards displaying titles, organizations, locations, deadlines, etc., is shown.

narrative_steps.title: Searching for Specific Role
narrative_steps.description: He types 'basketball coach' into the search bar to narrow down results.
narrative_steps.action: Type keywords into the search bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Results update in real time showing only relevant job postings.

narrative_steps.title: Filtering by Location
narrative_steps.description: Jordan applies a filter for jobs located in his preferred city.
narrative_steps.action: Select location filter option.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Only jobs matching the selected location are displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Detailed Job Info
narrative_steps.description: He clicks on a promising job card to see more details.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a job card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the detailed job view page with full description and application option.

requirement_tested: Job application system enabling athletes to apply for positions of interest
user_persona: Jordan, interested in applying for a basketball coaching position.
user_goal: Submit an application for a coaching job along with a cover letter.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Application Modal
narrative_steps.description: On the job detail page, Jordan clicks the Apply Now button.
narrative_steps.action: Click the Apply Now button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Modal window opens with a form asking for a cover letter and start date availability.

narrative_steps.title: Completing Application Form
narrative_steps.description: Jordan writes a brief cover letter explaining why he's fit for the role and selects his earliest availability date.
narrative_steps.action: Enter text in cover letter textarea and pick a date from calendar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Form is filled with no errors and ready for submission.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Application
narrative_steps.description: He submits the completed form.
narrative_steps.action: Click the Submit button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Application is submitted successfully with a success message and modal closes.

requirement_tested: Real-time messaging system facilitating communication between athletes and organizations
user_persona: Coach Taylor wants to discuss application details with Jordan.
user_goal: Send a direct message to Jordan regarding his job application.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Conversation
narrative_steps.description: Coach Taylor opens the messaging interface and selects Jordan’s conversation thread.
narrative_steps.action: Open chat sidebar and click on Jordan’s name.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Message history with Jordan loads in the main chat panel.

narrative_steps.title: Sending Message
narrative_steps.description: Taylor composes a quick message inviting Jordan for an interview and hits send.
narrative_steps.action: Type message in input box and click Send or press Enter.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Message is sent instantly and appears in both sender and receiver’s chat view.

requirement_tested: Notification system delivering alerts for job applications, messages, and platform updates
user_persona: Jordan checks his notifications after submitting an application.
user_goal: Review notifications about his recent job application and incoming messages.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Notification Panel
narrative_steps.description: Jordan notices the bell icon showing unread notifications and clicks it.
narrative_steps.action: Click the notification bell icon.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dropdown panel with list of notifications appears, highlighting unread ones.

narrative_steps.title: Reading Important Alert
narrative_steps.description: One notification informs him that his application was received.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the notification item.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Notification marked as read and redirected to the related job application page.

narrative_steps.title: Marking All Read
narrative_steps.description: Finally, Jordan clears all remaining notifications by marking them as read.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Mark all as read' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All notifications are marked as read and the badge count resets.

requirement_tested: Admin dashboard for sports organizations to manage posted jobs and applicant communications
user_persona: Coach Taylor managing multiple job posts and applicants.
user_goal: Review applications received for a posted job and close the listing if needed.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Admin Dashboard
narrative_steps.description: Taylor logs in and accesses the admin dashboard under the Posted Jobs tab.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the admin dashboard.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Table of posted jobs with columns for title, applicants count, status, and actions is displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Applicants
narrative_steps.description: He clicks on the applicant count link for one job to review submissions.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the applicant count number.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Modal opens showing a list of applicants with their names, dates, and statuses.

narrative_steps.title: Closing Job Listing
narrative_steps.description: Deciding enough quality candidates have applied, Taylor closes the job posting.
narrative_steps.action: Toggle the job status switch to closed.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Job status changes to closed and no longer accepts new applications.

requirement_tested: Responsive web design with ghost white background and slate gray UI elements
user_persona: Jordan viewing the site on different devices throughout the day.
user_goal: Use the platform smoothly across desktop and mobile screens.

narrative_steps.title: Desktop Browsing Experience
narrative_steps.description: Jordan opens the website on his desktop computer and browses various sections.
narrative_steps.action: Open site on desktop browser.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Site renders with ghost white background and slate gray UI components in a multi-panel layout.

narrative_steps.title: Mobile Responsiveness Check
narrative_steps.description: Later, he checks the same pages on his smartphone.
narrative_steps.action: Resize browser or open on mobile device.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout stacks vertically with consistent styling and readable fonts adjusted for small screen size.

narrative_steps.title: Fixed Header Navigation
narrative_steps.description: While scrolling through long job listings, Jordan scrolls past content but keeps header visible.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll vertically through content.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Header stays fixed at the top during scrolling on all screen sizes.

requirement_tested: Frontend application that fetches all dynamic data through backend APIs
user_persona: Jordan visiting the job board for the latest openings.
user_goal: Load job listings seamlessly with proper feedback on slow networks.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Dynamic Content
narrative_steps.description: Upon entering the job browsing section, Jordan waits briefly as data loads.
narrative_steps.action: Visit job listings page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Spinner/loading indicator shows while fetching data from API before rendering job cards.

narrative_steps.title: Handling Network Errors Gracefully
narrative_steps.description: Due to unstable internet, the API fails once, triggering an error display.
narrative_steps.action: Simulate network failure during data fetch.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Error toast/banner appears indicating failed data retrieval without breaking the UI.

requirement_tested: Backend API service connecting to PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
user_persona: System administrator deploying the backend service locally.
user_goal: Ensure backend connects properly to PostgreSQL with correct config.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Server
narrative_steps.description: Admin runs the backend server using predefined environment variables for database connection.
narrative_steps.action: Execute command to start the backend server.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Server initializes and establishes a successful connection to PostgreSQL database using DB_* env vars.

narrative_steps.title: Processing Incoming Requests
narrative_steps.description: Once running, the server receives a GET request for job listings.
narrative_steps.action: Make a sample API call to retrieve job listings.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Request is handled by appropriate controller function which executes SQL query and returns data.

requirement_tested: Database schema supporting users, profiles, job postings, applications, and messages
user_persona: Database developer verifying relational structure implementation.
user_goal: Confirm that tables were created correctly and maintain referential integrity.

narrative_steps.title: Initializing Database Schema
narrative_steps.description: Developer runs setup script to initialize the database with necessary tables.
narrative_steps.action: Run postgresSetupScript to create database and tables.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Empty tables for users, profiles, jobs, applications, messages, and notifications are created with defined relationships.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Referential Integrity
narrative_steps.description: Inserts a sample user followed by dependent records to validate constraints.
narrative_steps.action: Insert test data into parent-child linked tables.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Foreign key constraints enforce data consistency preventing orphaned records.

requirement_tested: Role-based access control distinguishing between athletes and sports organizations
user_persona: Jordan tries to access restricted organizational features.
user_goal: Verify unauthorized access attempts are blocked appropriately.

narrative_steps.title: Attempting Unauthorized Access
narrative_steps.description: As an athlete, Jordan tries to access the job posting endpoint reserved for organizations.
narrative_steps.action: Attempt to access POST /api/jobs without organizational privileges.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Request is denied with a 403 Forbidden response due to role guard middleware enforcement.

requirement_tested: Performance optimization features ensuring fast loading and smooth user experience
user_persona: Jordan repeatedly views job listings daily.
user_goal: Experience faster load times thanks to caching and optimized queries.

narrative_steps.title: First Visit Loads Fresh Data
narrative_steps.description: On first visit, Jordan sees job listings fetched directly from the database.
narrative_steps.action: Load job listings page for the first time.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Data retrieved from database and rendered with minimal delay.

narrative_steps.title: Subsequent Visits Benefit From Cache
narrative_steps.description: Returning shortly afterward, Jordan experiences quicker rendering due to cached responses.
narrative_steps.action: Reload the job listings page within cache expiry period.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Cached version serves the data significantly faster than the initial load.

requirement_tested: Repository configuration with package.json supporting npm run install:all and npm run dev commands
user_persona: Developer setting up the project for local development.
user_goal: Install dependencies and launch both frontend and backend servers concurrently.

narrative_steps.title: Installing Project Dependencies
narrative_steps.description: Developer clones the repo and runs the installation script.
narrative_steps.action: Run 'npm run install:all'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dependencies installed in root, client/, and server/ directories simultaneously.

narrative_steps.title: Launching Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: After installation, developer starts both frontend and backend services together.
narrative_steps.action: Run 'npm run dev'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Frontend starts on port 3000 and backend API server on port 3001 concurrently.
